sources.title: Chasing 3000 (Free Full Movie) Sports, Family
sources.description:
Based on the true story of two brothers who steal their mother's car to drive cross country to see their hero, Roberto Clemente, get his 3000th hit in 1972.


Directed by  Gregory J. Lanesey
2010
Starring Ray Liotta, Seymour Cassel, Rory Culkin, Keith David

Edited for YouTube ad standards
